mapper.insert: insert into pg_settings (`name`, setting, unit, category, short_desc, extra_desc, context, vartype, `source`, min_val, max_val, enumvals, boot_val, reset_val, sourcefile, sourceline, pending_restart) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extraDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enumvals,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{bootVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resetVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcefile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pendingRestart,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select `name`, setting, unit, category, short_desc, extra_desc, context, vartype, `source`, min_val, max_val, enumvals, boot_val, reset_val, sourcefile, sourceline, pending_restart from pg_settings
